pages.title: Magical Sap
pages.text: Magical Sap Buckets can be extracted from Magic Logs via the Sap Extractor

pages.name: Magic Tree
pages.text: This is the Magic Tree, it can be found inside the Mystical Forest, Take its Logs to a Sap Extractor to gain Buckets of Magical Sap

pages.title: Sap Extractor GUI
pages.text: Using The Sap Extractor:$(li)Left Hand Slot: Add Any Magic Logs Or Magic Wood$(li)Far Right Slot: Place Empty Buckets$(li)Center Slot: Output Slot to collect Magical Sap

pages.title: Crafting Recipe
pages.text: The Sap Extractor can be connected to Hoppers!$(li)Connect a Hopper to the Left to fill with Logs/Wood$(li)Connect a Hopper to the Right to fill with Empty Buckets$(li)Connect a Hopper Below to collect crafted Magical Sap Buckets
